name: Brian Plachta
what_you_do: Helps people experience the direct Presence of God in their daily lives through practical spirituality, books, webinars, guided meditations, one-to-one spiritual direction, weekly inspirational articles, retreats, seminars, and workshops.
who_you_serve: Individuals and groups who desire a direct connection with God and wish to experience the Creator's wisdom and unconditional love as a guiding force in their life.
social_proof: Bestselling author, speaker, and spiritual mentor-coach with a following.
signature_programs: Finding Flow book, Life's Toolbox book, Pillars of Steel book, Spiritual Gifts Inventory, guided meditations, weekly inspirational articles.
business_focus: Helping people connect with the Divine and experience inner peace, balance, and wholeness.
service_provided: books, webinars, guided meditations, one-to-one spiritual direction, weekly inspirational articles, retreats, seminars, workshops
